dcterms:creator: Hannah Rashkin
Eunsol Choi
Jin Yea Jang
Svitlana Volkova
Yejin Choi
dcterms:description: This dataset was built from two different sources, for the trusted news (real news) they sampled news articles from the English Gigaword corpus. For the false news, they collected articles from seven different unreliable news sites. These news articles include satires, hoaxes, and propagandas but not clickbaits.
dcterms:title: News Articles Dataset

dcterms:creator: Abhijnan Chakraborty
Bhargavi Paranjape

Niloy Ganguly
dcterms:description: This dataset was originally collected from two sources: Wikinews articlesâ€™ headlines and other online sites that are known to publish clickbaits.
dcterms:title: Clickbait Dataset

dcterms:creator: Svitlana Volkova
Kyle Shaffer
Jin Yea Jang
Nathan Hodas
dcterms:description: This dataset was created based on public resources that annotated suspicious Twitter accounts. The authors built a dataset by collecting tweets from these accounts and made it available.
dcterms:title: Twitter Dataset
